nodes.text: N'haz Mit was a wanted criminal who was tracked down and killed on the planet Necropolis by Boba Fett. A short time later, Mit was alive again, likely due to Dr. Cornelius Evazan's experiments pertaining to Project Starscream.[source?] Fett then returned to the planet and killed him a second time.
"N'haz Mit" is Tim Zahn spelled backwards.
